question: National Council of Science Museums (NCSM) has set up Science Centre in Udaipur, located in which state?
explanation:
National Council of Science Museums (NCSM) has set up Science Centre in Udaipur, in the state of Tripura.
The Governor of Tripura Ramesh Bais has inaugurated the Udaipur Science Centre, which has been developed at a cost of Rs 6 crore. It is funded jointly by the Ministry of Culture and Department of Science, Technology and Environment, Tripura Government.
